flawed_nl_solution:
On Monday, 1200/3=<<1200/3=400>>400 dollars were made.
On Tuesday, 1200/4=<<1200/4=300>>300 dollars were made.
On Wednesday, 1200-400-300=<<1200-400-300=50>>50 dollars were made.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 500.0, not 50.0. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
